text:
<!everyone>
By way of a little update ... *some of our students do not have access to WiFi at home* (unfortunately)  and one of our schools had (accidentally & temporarily) blocked access to the Slack platform. This means that they haven't been able to log in on time and/or you might see a delay in the responses you get from them.

We had planned for some of you to take on more than 1 Mentee (where you had said you'd be happy to when you signed up of course :wink:), and the school IT team are fixing it so hopefully they'll all be logged in by Monday next week latest to meet you!
